Brazen Vessel

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 332
magic bonus [boosters]: +B
inferno return [infernoret]: 20%
kokytos return [kokytosret]: 20%

Requires 40B to forge (B5)

This metal skull contains a bound devil. The devil whispers secrets into the ears of the bearer and enhances his skills in Blood magic.
